block_condition.description: If specified, only blocks that fulfill this condition are affected.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only blocks that fulfill this condition are affected.

type.description:
## Prevent Block Use

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_block_use)

Prevents the usage of blocks for the player that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:prevent_block_use`



---

### üìù Note

Preventing the "usage" of a block means that the player won't be able to interact (right-click) with the said block.






---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:prevent_block_use",
    "block_condition": {
      "type": "origins:block",
      "block": "minecraft:crafting_table"
    }
}
```

This example will prevent the player from using Crafting Tables.
